item.title: ScanStringTime
item.description: {{ ScanStringTime Field Layout Location }} Example var queryDate = sqlt.One[string, time.Time](sqlt.Parse(` SELECT '2025-04-06' {{ ScanStringTime "" "DateOnly" "UTC" }} FROM books WHERE title = {{ . }} `)) // Predefined layouts: var layoutMap = map[string]string{ "DateTime": time.DateTime, "DateOnly": time.DateOnly, "TimeOnly": time.TimeOnly, "RFC3339": time.RFC3339, "RFC3339Nano": time.RFC3339Nano, "Layout": time.Layout, "ANSIC": time.ANSIC, "UnixDate": time.UnixDate, "RubyDate": time.RubyDate, "RFC822": time.RFC822, "RFC822Z": time.RFC822Z, "RFC850": time.RFC850, "RFC1123": time.RFC1123, "RFC1123Z": time.RFC1123Z, "Kitchen": time.Kitchen, "Stamp": time.Stamp, "StampMilli": time.
